Summary: Bright red object, thought it was mars, VERY big looking star
divs: sighting detailsjust got home, saw a bright red object in the sky, it had me baffled. i stood outside and looked at it for 5 whole long minutes, trying to figure out what it was, no way it was an airplane because it had no green nav light and i picked 4 points in the sky to see if it was moving in any direction and it wasn't. i thought it was mars that just happened to be really big tonight, it was so bright and orangish\red and it was just up in the air there so hard to miss, so i went inside to grab my android phone with google sky maps on it turned it on and pointed it in the direction i saw it from my room, and nothing was listed, so i went back outside and it was totally gone. no noise, no sound, no light path or tail on the object, i just thought it was a really big bright star. apparently it wasn't.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Millbury
There were no other sightings in Millbury on or around April 25th 2012
